title: Caitlyn 8.3 buffs?
body: just curious, but what happened to the supposing caitlyn buff in 8.3? they been very quiet about  it and majority of the buffing and nerfing seems almost completed. is it still going to happen? any information would be very helpful thank you in advance.{{champion:51}}

replies.body:
I wasn't aware that {{champion:51}}  needed a buff...

{{champion:21}}  however, certainly needs a nerf.
its just that they mentioned it but then nothing happened
